13896.「大丈夫。すぐに よくなる。\n さあ 眠りなさい アルノー。:
Don't worry. You'll be fine. Go back to sleep,
Arnoud.

13898.「あの子は…… アルノーは 私の息子なのだ。: That boy... Arnoud is my son.

13899.「……<pc>。\n 私が 恐れていた日が 来てしまった。:
...<pc>. The day I had feared had
come.

13900.「これは ただの はやり病ではない。\n 死神の息吹…… ３００年もの昔に\n:
This is no mere epidemic. It is the breath of
the Reaper... a disease of perdition that
claimed the lives of many 300 years ago.

13901.「冒された者は 身体に 黒いアザが現れ\n やがては 死に至る。このままでは……:
Those affected will develop black bruises on
their bodies, which will eventually lead to
death. If this continues...

13904.「そうでしたか…… やはり はやり病とは\n 死神の息吹のことだったんですね。:
I guess that's right... so, the rash disease
is the breath of the Reaper after all.

13905.「じつは ともしびの木の お礼がしたくて\n いろいろ調べていたら 香術の書に\:
Actually, I wanted to thank you for the Lamplight Tree, so I did some research and found a reference to the Reaper's breath in
the Book of Perfumery.

13906.「それによると ３００年前に\n 死神の息吹から 人々を救ったのは\n 閃香樹と:
According to the report, it was a fragrant
tree called Senko-ju that saved people from
the Reaper's breath 300 years ago.

13907.「ですが……私も 長年 香術師をやってますが\n 閃香樹という香木は 聞いたこと:
But... in all my years as a perfumer, I've
never heard of a fragrant tree called Senko-
ju.

13908.「でも ちょうど 北西のモリナラ大森林に\n エルトナ・レンジャー協会モリナラ支:
But just to the northwest, in the Molinara
Forest, there is a cabin of the Molinara
Chapter of the Eltona Rangers Association.

13909.「森の木々をよく知る レンジャーたちなら\n 閃香樹のことが わかるかもしれませ:
Rangers who know the trees in the forest may
be able to tell us more about Senkaiki. Let's
go!

13910.「ここは 世界に 名立たる\n エルトナ・レンジャー協会\n モリナラ支部で ご:
This is the Molinara branch of the world-
renowned Eltona Rangers Association.

13911.「……なるほど。\n 閃香樹について お知りになりたいと？ \n よろしい。お教:
I see. You want to know more about Senkaiki?
Very well. I will tell you.

13912.「閃香樹は 神聖なチカラが宿るといわれ\n 昔から 祭事などに 使われていた木で:
Senko-ju is a tree that is said to possess
sacred power and has been used for rituals
since ancient times.

13913.「それが証拠に あなた方の\n キリカ修道会に伝わる 木彫りの神像も\n 閃香樹:
As proof of this, the Wood Carved Idols of
your Kirika Order are also made from the wood
of the Incense tree.

13914.「ですが……今から 閃香樹を探しても\n 手には入りませんぞ。なにしろ\n ３０:
But...you won't get it by looking for the
sparkling tree now. After all, the tree has
been extinct for 300 years.

13915.「なんと……！ <pc>さん。\n 木かげの集落に 戻りましょう。\n 僧正様た:
Oh my...! <pc>. Let's go back to
Treeshade Village. We must tell the monks
about this.

13916.「おお <pc>と\n 香術師の方では ありませんか。\n いったい おふたりで:
Oh, isn't that <pc> and the perfumer?
Where in the world are you two going?

13917.「じつは 私と <pc>さんは\n 死神の息吹から 人々を救う方法を\n 探して:
As a matter of fact, <pc> and I were
looking for a way to save people from the
Reaper's breath.

13918.「そして ３００年前に 死神の息吹が \n 吹き荒れた時 閃香樹という香木による:
And I found out that 300 years ago, when the Reaper's breath blew in, the art of incense with a fragrant tree called Incense Tree,
saved the lives of the people of that time.

13919.「ですが……残念ながら その閃香樹は\n すでに 絶滅していました……。:
But unfortunately, the Senka tree had already
become extinct...

13922.「じゃじゃ～ん！ なんと！\n あなた方の ご神像が その閃香樹で\n 作られて:
Ta-da! What a surprise! We have discovered
that your Idol is made of the Senko-ju!

13924.「……つまり あのご神像を お香にして焚けば \n みんな 助かるってことですよ:
...In other words, if we burn that Idol as
incense, everyone will be saved!

13926.「あの ご神像には まことに\n エルドナ神が 宿っている。\n それを焚くこと:
That Idol is the very residence of the god
Eldona. There is no way you can burn it.

13928.「だが よく調べてくれた。\n その 絶滅した閃香樹とかいうのが\n 他に残って:
But you did your research. I'll see if I can
find any more of that extinct Senka tree or
whatever it's called.

13929.「<pc>よ ご苦労でしたね。\n これを お持ちなさい。:
<pc>, I'm sorry you had a hard time.
Here, take this.

13930.「今は これ以上 できることは ありません。\n 死神の息吹のことは 我らにまか:
There is nothing more we can do for you now.
Leave the Reaper's breath to us, and return to
your training.

13931.「案ずることはない。\n 必ず 閃香樹を見つけだしてみせる。\n あの子を……:
Don't worry. I will find Senkaiki. I will not
let her... let Arnoud die.

32314.「はぁはぁ…… どうして？\n なんで みんな 悲しそうな顔するの？:
Ha-ha-ha... Why? Why does everyone look so
sad?

32315.「ボク…どんなに 苦しくてもガマンできるよ。\n お母さんが どんな病気も 治し:
I can endure it no matter how painful it is.
My mother will heal me no matter how sick I
am. So don't worry about me.
